title: Script mix of Corsica and Caflisch
content:
The speckled look is a result of the scanner not the font itself.

The font is solid in color.

Thank you for you assistance!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120505163026im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font2_5390.gif)

Edited to correct the image.
author: nitesdaydreamer

comments.content:
Hi Anne,  
welcome to Typophile!  
This is [Perpetua Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120505163026/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/perpetua_pro_italic/&sample_text=The%20Campaign%20for%20Phi%20Theta) by [Eric Gill](http://web.archive.org/web/20120505163026/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Eric%20Gill).  
F
